metdetection.meter.lpcfg

Class MetricalLpcfgHead

  • java.lang.Object
    • metdetection.meter.lpcfg.MetricalLpcfgHead
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<MetricalLpcfgHead>

    public class MetricalLpcfgHead
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<MetricalLpcfgHead>, java.io.Serializable
    A MetricalLpcfgHead represents the head of a node in our lexicalized pcfg. It contains information about the longest note lying under a node, that note's location relative to the start of the beat, and whether that note begins from a tie. It's natural ordering is first by decreasing length, then by increasing startQuantum, and finally by tiesIn, where false comes first.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 5 May, 2016
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double length
      The length of this head, normalized so that a value of 1.0 represents the sub beat length.
      private static long serialVersionUID
      Version 1
      private double startQuantum
      The offset of the quantum which begins the first occurrence of a note of this head's length in the current node, normalized so that a value of 1.0 represents the sub beat length.
      private boolean tiesIn
      True if this head starts with a TIE.

      • serialVersionUID

        Version 1

        Constant Field Values

      • length

        private final double length
        The length of this head, normalized so that a value of 1.0 represents the sub beat length.

      • tiesIn

        private final boolean tiesIn
        True if this head starts with a TIE. False otherwise. This can only be true if startQuantum == 0.

      • startQuantum

        private final double startQuantum
        The offset of the quantum which begins the first occurrence of a note of this head's length in the current node, normalized so that a value of 1.0 represents the sub beat length.
